name: eximal
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))), wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1))
-| wb(wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1))
-| wb(wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))

|- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wi(wex(s0, w0), w1), wi(wn(w1), wal(s0, wn(w0))))

comment: An equivalence between an implication with an existentially quantified antecedent and an implication with a universally quantified consequent. An interesting case is when the same formula is substituted for both ` ph ` and ` ps ` , since then both implications express a type of non-freeness. See also ~ alimex . (Contributed by BJ, 12-May-2019.)
